text: 5:15 Matyu 9:21; 14:36; Aposel 19:12Kamaghɨn, gumaziba arɨmariar gumazamiziba inigha men mɨsiaba ko akuriaba sara me atera iza tuavir mɨriamɨn me arɨsi. Me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim iti, Pitan nedazim me gisɨn mangɨtɨ me ua ghuamagham.5:15 Gumazamizir kaba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim kamaghɨn iti, aruem Pita gisiraghtɨ an nedazim arɨmariar gumazamizibagh isɨn ikɨtɨ, me ua deragham.
